intro.title: Hi, I'm Jason.
intro.text: I'm 17 years old and an apprentice in application development.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Since childhood, it has been my goal to become a computer scientist. Now I’m at WISS to pursue my dream profession.
about.p2: My interest in computer science started early, driven by my curiosity to understand how technologies work and are developed.
about.p3: My strengths include time management and analytical problem-solving skills. These help me tackle complex challenges in a structured way.
about.p4: In teamwork, I value a respectful and productive environment supported by open communication and mutual support.
about.p5: I am confident that I can actively contribute to a successful collaboration with my skills.

interests.title: Interests
interests.text: Building computers, creating websites, strategy games, and police series.

education.heading: Application Development IT Specialist
education.school: WISS School for Business, IT and Real Estate

S1.module: 117 Implement IT and network infrastructure for a small business
122 Automate processes with a scripting language
431 Independently complete tasks in your own professional environment
187 Set up ICT workstation with OS (UEK)

S2.module: 114 Use coding, compression, and encryption techniques
254 Describe business processes in your professional environment
306 Manage small projects in your field

S3.module: 294 Implement frontend of an interactive web app (UEK)

descriptions.notepad: A simple Java notepad application that allows creating, editing, and deleting notes.
descriptions.calculator: A simple Java application that allows performing basic mathematical operations.
descriptions.randomGame: A simple Java application that allows generating and guessing random numbers.
descriptions.clicker: A simple clicker game where players click bugs to collect points.
descriptions.shoppinglist: A simple Android app that allows creating and managing a shopping list.
descriptions.tictactoe: A simple Tic-Tac-Toe game with some extensions for longer fun. Instead of X and O, images are used, and the board can be expanded up to 5×5 squares.
descriptions.firmen: This website allows companies to contact me through registration. Every company is guaranteed an email from me. They can also view the current status of my application at any time on the website.
descriptions.immobilien: It is a website where employees can quickly and easily list properties for sale. Customers can quickly and clearly view properties with images and data.
